attributes.action: set up a full public enquiry into Orgin Housing Group Limited
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the failure of HM Government and the regulators to act on the complaints of false and fraudulent trading by Origin Housing Group Limitedf during the last five years this a formal request that HM Government grants our request for a full public enquiry into the affairs of Origin Housing Group Limited (Trading as St. Pancras and Humanist HA, SP & HHA Ltd., SPH,SPH Housing, All Pay, Pay Ltd, All pay net & SPH Friends etc) its contractors Capita Group plc and T H Kenyon & Sons plc and its associated by 31.03.09

rejection.details:
Individual cases such as this are a matter for the Housing Ombudsman in the first instance.
www.ihos.org.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
